alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mellette and east central Jackson Counties through 230 AM MDT/330 AM CDT/... At 145 AM MDT/245 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Belvidere, or 10 miles southeast of Kadoka, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norris, Cedar Butte, Corn Creek, Black Pipe and Intersection of Highway 73 and White River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
